languages.text: {n}Чистоголосый пророк был схвачен и безжалостно казнен при стечении народа. Экзекуция напомнила о покорности добрым подданным Вольного Торговца, но разожгла гнев среди непочтительной черни.{/n}

{n}The Pure-Voiced Prophet was arrested and mercilessly executed in front of the people. The execution reminded the Rogue Trader's faithful subjects about the virtues of obedience but stoked anger among the rabble.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Чистоголосый пророк был схвачен и безжалостно казнен при стечении народа. Экзекуция напомнила о покорности добрым подданным Вольного Торговца, но разожгла гнев среди непочтительной черни.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The Pure-Voiced Prophet was arrested and mercilessly executed in front of the people. The execution reminded the Rogue Trader's faithful subjects about the good of obedience but stoked anger among the rabble.{/n}

languages.text: {n}纯洁之声先知被逮捕，在所有人面前被无情处决。尽管这场处决警告了行商浪人忠实臣民要遵从服从的美德，但也激起了乌合之众的愤怒。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Pure-Voiced Prophet was arrested and mercilessly executed in front of the people. The execution reminded the Rogue Trader's faithful subjects about the virtues of obedience but stoked anger among the rabble.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}纯洁之声先知被逮捕，在所有人面前被无情处决。尽管这场处决警告了行商浪人忠实臣民要遵从服从的美德，但也激起了乌合之众的愤怒。{/n}

languages.text: {n}El Profeta de Voz Pura fue arrestado y ejecutado sin piedad delante del pueblo. La ejecución recordó a los fieles súbditos {mf|del|de la} Comerciante Independiente las virtudes de la obediencia, pero avivó la ira entre la plebe.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Pure-Voiced Prophet was arrested and mercilessly executed in front of the people. The execution reminded the Rogue Trader's faithful subjects about the virtues of obedience but stoked anger among the rabble.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}El Profeta de Voz Pura fue arrestado y ejecutado sin piedad delante del pueblo. La ejecución recordó a los fieles súbditos {mf|del|de la} Comerciante Independiente las virtudes de la obediencia, pero avivó la ira entre la plebe.{/n}

languages.text: {n}純声の預言者は逮捕され、民の前で容赦なく処刑された。この処刑は、ローグトレーダーの忠実な者たちには服従の美徳を思い起こさせたが、民衆は怒りをかき立てられた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Pure-Voiced Prophet was arrested and mercilessly executed in front of the people. The execution reminded the Rogue Trader's faithful subjects about the virtues of obedience but stoked anger among the rabble.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}純声の預言者は逮捕され、民の前で容赦なく処刑された。この処刑は、ローグトレーダーの忠実な者たちには服従の美徳を思い起こさせたが、民衆は怒りをかき立てられた。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Le prophète Pure-Voix est arrêté et exécuté en place publique. Si cette sentence impitoyable rappelle les vertus de l'obéissance aux loyaux sujets {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande}, elle attise également la colère du peuple.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Pure-Voiced Prophet was arrested and mercilessly executed in front of the people. The execution reminded the Rogue Trader's faithful subjects about the virtues of obedience but stoked anger among the rabble.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Le prophète Pure-Voix est arrêté et exécuté en place publique. Si cette sentence impitoyable rappelle les vertus de l'obéissance aux loyaux sujets {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande}, elle attise également la colère du peuple.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Der Prophet mit der Reinen Stimme wurde verhaftet und vor den Augen des Volkes gnadenlos hingerichtet. Die Hinrichtung erinnerte die treuen Untertanen {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} an die Tugend des Gehorsams, löste im Pöbel aber großen Zorn aus.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Pure-Voiced Prophet was arrested and mercilessly executed in front of the people. The execution reminded the Rogue Trader's faithful subjects about the virtues of obedience but stoked anger among the rabble.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Peygamber Durusöz, tutuklanarak insanların önünde merhametsizce idam edildi. İdam, Hür Tacir'in inançlı tebaasına itaatkârlığın erdemlerini hatırlatsa da ayaktakımının öfkesini körükledi.{/n}
